org.lightningj.paywall.util

Class Base58

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.util.Base58

  • public class Base58
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for Base58 encoding and decoding of data. Important, this class in not fully optimized and is recommended to be used only in places where highly optimised encoding is not required. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-10-10.

                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method to decode a base58 encoded byte array.
